Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

I'm here since a long time now reading the forums and dling mods, got ksp by an not very conventional way (ashamed) and I really..really liked it !

Playing ksp since about a year now, it was really time for me to present myself to you, and tell you that I've got my ksp licence key now ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

So, hum, I'm Samy, and I'm 26 yrs old now, I'm an electronics and fiber optics engineer, and really interested in astronomics and physics, that's why I "LOVED" ksp in the first time.

It's really a pleasure to be with you, and I really wanted to make this post and present myself to you, before the 1.0 rush ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I hope I'll find a place with you, and it's, again, a pleasure to be with you.

Sincerly, Samy.
Welcome aboard! Release Fever has certainly taken a hold.

You can call me Samy, after months of lurking I finally made my account ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

any questions ? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Samy, I played for months with the demo before coughing up for 0.23. You went legit before 1.0, honest AND smart.
Welcome, welcome! Enjoy the new version!
